{"id":859427004,"question_id":4,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1670980922,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"116 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/859427004/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"46.6 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number[]} nums1\n * @param {number[]} nums2\n * @return {number}\n */\nvar findMedianSortedArrays = function(nums1, nums2) {\n    let n = 0;\n  let m = 0;\n  let arr = [];\n\n  while (n < nums1.length && m < nums2.length) {\n    if (nums1[n] < nums2[m]) {\n      arr.push(nums1[n]);\n      n++;\n    } else {\n      arr.push(nums2[m]);\n      m++;\n    }\n  }\n\n  while (n < nums1.length) {\n    arr.push(nums1[n]);\n    n++;\n  }\n\n  while (m < nums2.length) {\n    arr.push(nums2[m]);\n    m++;\n  }\n\n  let mid = (arr.length / 2) - 1;\n\n  if (Math.floor(mid) !== Math.ceil(mid)) {\n    return arr[Math.ceil(mid)];\n  } \n  let avg = (arr[mid] + arr[mid + 1]) / 2;\n  return avg;\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
